channel.title: Comments on: Google’s Nexus One Will Be $530

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: According to the rumors, it will support T-Mobile's bands including 3G but can also use AT&T with EDGE data only, no 3G. It won't work with Sprint or Verizon because they use different radio technology (CDMA vs. GSM).
item.content:encoded: According to the rumors, it will support T-Mobile’s bands including 3G but can also use AT&T with EDGE data only, no 3G. It won’t work with Sprint or Verizon because they use different radio technology (CDMA vs. GSM).

item.title: By: Marcel
item.dc:creator: Marcel
item.description: Do you think we'll be able to use this on another carrier like Sprint?
item.content:encoded: Do you think we’ll be able to use this on another carrier like Sprint?
